oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Recordings of Tom T. Hall and George Burns from George Burns' "I Wish I Was Eighteen Again" single
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The recording are of a variety of songs from George Burns' (performer) "I Wish I Was Eighteen Again" single featuring: Tom T. Hall (performer) and an unidentified band. The recording is from 1980 (unconfirmed). The second recordings of "Mysteries of Life" and "I Wish I Was Eighteen Again" feature no lead vocal tracks.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Tom T. Hall; George Burns
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) I Wish I Was Eighteen Again (George Burns) -- (03:36) Mysteries of Life (Tom T. Hall) -- (06:41) [Unidentified] ([Unidentified]) -- (09:23) I Wish I Was Eighteen Again (George Burns) -- (12:55) Mysteries of Life (Tom T. Hall)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:isPartOf: Insert is of the donation slip from a Mr. R. J. Reynolds of the Barry Miller Corp. Library.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Burns, George; Hall, Tom T.;
